name: Graveyard Cleaning!
description:
Cleaning games are fun, and grave cleaning is another level of fun!
Graveyard cleaning will give you the satisfaction you can get from cleaning games while remembering famous celebrity characters throughout history!
Do a deep clean of your favorite dead celebrity graves , they will be grateful for that (or maybe grave-full?) dead people like to have a clean stairway to heaven, but their tombstone is just important!
Don’t worry (: it’s not scary! Only if you are afraid of cleaning chores! we are dead serious when we say It’s the best cleaning game out there.
Earn some Karma points by cleaning these gravestones of popular personalities and see what they've left behind!

To opt out of CrazyLabs sales of personal information as a California resident, please visit our Privacy Policy: https://crazylabs.com/app
